statements: DELETE FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE appliance_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_consumed >= 100 AND appliance_name LIKE 'Fridge%';
DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_used > 100 AND consumption_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM AppliancesInRooms WHERE room_id = 10 AND appliance_id = 5
DELETE FROM UserApplianceHistory WHERE user_id = 1 AND usage_date = '2022-05-20';
DELETE FROM AppliancesInRooms WHERE appliance_id = 3 AND room_id = 2;
